title: Stuck at Authenticating; Cannot Log In
body: Currently in a game (non-ranked, thankfully), and the game suddenly disconnects. Refuses to reconnect after a few minutes, so I exit the game. The beta client says I'm disconnected, even though the rest of my internet still works. After closing the client out entirely, the client won't even log me in, stuck at authenticating for 5-10 minutes before giving me an error and kicking me back to login. Is anyone else experiencing similar problems, and is there anything I can do to help this?

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  I see a few replies here regarding an ISP issue, and it does look like Comcast had some instability last night in the northwest.  Let me know if you're still having issues authenticating, I'll be happy to help!
Can we get compensated for our Lp, I got hit with 5 low que proorities that are 20 minutes long, and a loss on my promos

Same is happening to me now :( on eu west server just does not open loading screen after champs are selected, shoves me to reconect screen while i watch youtube videos on how to fix it .. still wont re connect. 


oh and i have leaver on two games now one more and i get the 20 min wait and it isn't even my fault?
HELP???
:'(
Cool, back online to see my team won and i lost lp. thanks comcast/rito
Appears the Comcast backbone issues have been resolved. Happy Gaming Everyone!
Hope many of the people who have this problem post so riot knows how widespread it is. Also i live on the west coast too.
Yeah, I live in the PNW area, too.
i live in bellingham, close to seattle, so must be west coast
I'm down in Oregon but still on the West coast. Having the same issues.
Spokane Washington, Same issue, and during the last minute of a ranked game we were winning but it was close.

Having same issue was disconnected during ranked game (ending up losing). I've tried switching to legacy clients, using the troubleshooting tool, and turning off my modem. Nothing is working ATM.

Region: Corvallis, OR
can't login !!! seattle,wa  ! fix this pls
Same.  Re updated client and it did not help.

Having similar issue was disconnected mid game. Was able to see everyone moving but I was still disconnected. Restarted client computer router and modem and still having issues. Running trace now and it looks like my connection is falling off at Comcast backbone in Seattle. I'm from Olympia wa :/

Edit last restart of client it said it reverted to a previous version than applied a 36mb patch... Oddly still stuck at authenticating.
same thing just happened to me, but i was in a ranked promo match.
